Class Summary
ActionModeCallbackProxy  
ActivityWatchService This Service runs in the background while the Secure Browser is active.
AIRAudioRecorder Wrapper around MediaRecorder that handles initializing, stopping, and canceling a standard recording.
AIRRecorder  
AIRRecorderCapability Model class used to store data about the devices recording capabilities.

BrowserActivity Main activity component of the Secure Browser.
DeviceStatus Data wrapper that holds information about the current device.
ExecShell  
FauxHome Dummy Class used when enabling/disabling home component.

FileDecryptionTask AsyncTask used to decrypt a file encrypted using FileEncryptionTask

FileEncryptionTask AsyncTask used to encrypt a file.
JSONUtil Utility class for converting standard data structures to json objects.
NetworkReceiver Receives network status change broadcasts and forwards them to its handler object.
OrigSettings Contains all original settings when application is launched.
PackageReceiver Receives package change broadcasts and forwards them to its handler object.
PreferencesActivity Activity used to display standard styled application preferences.
RootUtility Utility class that checks if the device is rooted.
SBReceiver Receives keyboard,mic,and blacklist status change broadcasts and forwards them to its handler object.
SecureWebClient Custom client for intercepting url requests and forwarding custom messages.
StartActivity This activity acts as a splash page for initializing the Secure Browser.
TTSPlayer This class acts as a wrapper around a TextToSpeech and MediaPlayer to provide Play/Pause/Resume/Stop functionality for text to speech.
UpdateJS Runnable implementation that executes a javascript command on the provided BrowserActivity.
